description: This tenders is for translation services and other associative services.
full_summary:

**Request for Proposal Description:**

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued for Translation, Editing, and Transcription Services. To minimizeaperiod of contract is from the date of contract award for a period of two years,  with two (2)  additional one (1) year period(s)under the same conditionsAnticipated Start Date: 2023/04/15.
